name: Cyber Police ESWAT
description: Cyber Police ESWAT (サイバーポリス イースワット) is a 1989 scrolling shooter arcade game developed and published by Sega. In 1989, Sega released a Mega Drive/Genesis version known in North America as ESWAT: City Under Siege. Players take control of Duke Oda, a member of the Liberty City Cyber Police Force tasked with finding and arresting the city's most wanted criminals, and eventually dismantling a terrorist organization planning world domination.
